channel.title: Need help converting a .bat to a .sh on linux, need assistance!
channel.description:
on my linux computer i am trying to convert the .bat into a .sh if anybody can help or knows how to do it, the server code for .bat i am trying to play on is going to be on the bottom: @echo off
title New Era
start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT thanks
